subject: Creativity
title: The Freemium Model: Giving Away Creativity to Sell It
description: A quick, practical guide to The Freemium Model: Giving Away Creativity to Sell It.

hook.text: Spotify gives away music for free (with ads). Only 44% of users pay. Yet it's worth $80 billion.

buildup.text: Freemium offers a free basic product and charges for premium features.

discovery.text: The psychology works because free eliminates the biggest barrier (risk).

punchline.text: Give away your best ideas. Charge for the transformation.
